original_title: Marvel Studios Assembled: The Making of Eternals
overview: Join director Chloe Zhao and the Cast of Eternals as they recount their experiences during the making of Marvel Studiosâ€™ most ambitious film to date. Discover how the ensemble cast felt stepping into their roles, filming in remote locations, and creating bonds that would help to create the on-screen relationships that span over 7,000 years.
tagline: From comic to screen, discover the making of Marvel's first heroes.
title: Marvel Studios Assembled: The Making of Eternals
